SELECT u.name AS patientName, u.card_number AS cardNumber, u.phone_number AS phoneNumber, ts.id AS timeSlotId, CONCAT(TIME_FORMAT(ts.start_time, '%H:%i'), '-', TIME_FORMAT(ts.end_time, '%H:%i')) AS timeLabel FROM bookings b INNER JOIN users u ON b.user_id = u.id INNER JOIN time_slots ts ON b.time_slot_id = ts.id WHERE b.business_date = #{date} AND b.status = 'reserved' ORDER BY ts.start_time

SELECT ts.id AS timeSlotId, CONCAT(TIME_FORMAT(ts.start_time, '%H:%i'), '-', TIME_FORMAT(ts.end_time, '%H:%i')) AS timeLabel, u.name AS patientName, u.card_number AS cardNumber, u.phone_number AS phoneNumber FROM time_slots ts LEFT JOIN bookings b ON b.time_slot_id = ts.id AND b.business_date = #{date} AND b.status = 'reserved' LEFT JOIN users u ON b.user_id = u.id WHERE ts.is_active = TRUE ORDER BY ts.start_time
